actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to extend the age limitation before which certain passenger vessels can qualify for operating-differential subsidies from 25 to 30 years.

summary.text: Amends the Merchant Marine Act, 1936, to extend the age limitation before which passenger ships delivered on or after December 1, 1952, can qualify for operating differential subsidies from 25 to 30 years.

titles.title: A bill to extend the age limitation before which certain passenger vessels can qualify for operating-differential subsidies from 25 to 30 years.
